text: Today on the West Coast, surf is firing at 7 ft @ 14s WNW with a light 12 mph S wind. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are prime spots, clean and fun throughout the day. Tomorrow sees a drop to 3 ft @ 10s WSW, still workable but a bit choppy with 15 mph S winds. The day after, conditions worsen with 4 ft @ 10s W, but fresh 20 mph SSW winds will make it blown out. Best: today.
